title: The Madison Cawthorn Takedown, Satan’s Back 05.02.22
itunes:title: The Madison Cawthorn Takedown, Satan’s Back 05.02.22
description:
In episode 1238, Jack and Miles are joined by Jared Holt to discuss…The Madison Cawthorn Take Down Is In Full Swing, General State of Consequences For The Extreme Right, Roger Stone Is Now Working For A Rinky Dink Far-Right Party in Canada Satan is coming back in a big way, and more!

  1. GOP Rep Madison Cawthorn is caught on video with male scheduler's hand on his crotch as new ethics complaint claims the congressman gave him thousands of dollars in loans and gifts
  2. Tweet: We are pleased to announce that Roger Stone is joining #TeamOntario as Senior Strategic Advisor for the Ontario Party.
  3. Political party in Ontario says Roger Stone has joined as adviser
  4. Conservative MP raising funds off his opposition to conversion therapy bill
  5. Conservatives have voted to expel Derek Sloan from caucus
  6. Independent MP, ousted by Tories over donation from white nationalist, leaves Ontario to run in Alberta
  7. Richards takes 15% hit in popularity but easily re-elected
  8. Former MP Derek Sloan to lead Ontario Party
  9. Roger Stone Is Raking It In—From Candidates He Endorses
  10. Meet Roger Stone: One of Trump's most loyal supporters whose 40-month prison sentence was just commuted
  11. Justice Department Sues Roger Stone for $2 Million in Unpaid Taxes
  12. Roger Stone raked in tens of thousands of dollars from defending Matt Gaetz and endorsing up-and-coming GOP candidates
  13. Former Trump advisor Roger Stone joins Ontario Party as strategist
  14. How much do Canadians dislike Donald Trump? A lot.
  15. Tweet: Longtime GOP dirty trickster Roger Stone claims to have discovered a "satanic portal" over the White House, and he even has photos to prove it. 
  16. The Complicated Feud That Started When Marjorie Taylor Greene Said Satan Was Controlling the Catholic Church

FOLLOW: Jared on Twitter

Check Out: The Atlantic Council // Digital Forensic Research Lab and SH!TPOST Podcast

LISTEN: Ayonha by Hamid Al Shaeri 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
